# instmplts

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of instmplts is to facilitate the setup of for the report in 
the UStar2-course

## Installation

You can install the version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with help of 
the {remotes}-package: 

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("cathblatter/instmplts")
```

## How to use it?

After installing the package you will have access to the Rmarkdown-Templates. 

1. Open a new .Rmd-file *File --> New File --> R Markdown*  

2. Under "From Template" select the "Report UStaR2". You need to choose the 
  directory to place the report.
